str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To do not know, be ignorant of, sometimes with the idea of willful ignorance.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
